{}.response: The fuel rate API is designed to provide users with the latest fuel prices across different cities in India. This powerful tool grants access to updated information on fuel costs, allowing users, businesses, and researchers to make informed decisions based on current rates. However, due to the lack of specific input parameters, no city has been selected for fetching the fuel rate, and consequently, no fuel price data can be provided at this moment. To receive accurate fuel rate information, please provide the input parameter 'city_name' with the name of the city you are interested in. For instance, an appropriate request would include {'city_name': 'New Delhi'} to get the latest fuel rates in New Delhi. Once a 'city_name' parameter is provided, the API will respond with the current fuel price for the specified city, which may include prices of different types of fuel such as petrol, diesel, CNG, and LPG, if applicable.

{'city_name': 'Mumbai'}.response: The fuel rate API has successfully retrieved the latest fuel prices for Mumbai. As of the latest update, the prices are as follows: Petrol is priced at Rs 97.57 per litre, while Diesel stands at Rs 88.60 per litre. In addition to these, Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) is available at Rs 76.31 per kg and Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) is being sold at Rs 594.00 per cylinder (14.2 kg). Please be aware that fuel prices are subject to frequent changes due to various factors including but not limited to changes in international market rates, local taxes, and supply-demand dynamics. It's highly recommended to check back regularly to get the most up-to-date fuel prices for Mumbai or any other city you are interested in. Stay informed and plan your fuel expenses by regularly visiting our API for the latest price updates.
